name: Birkenstock Arizona Leather Sandals - Unisex
description: Classic Birks: comfortable, supportive and ready for the long haul. Whether you pair them with a thick wool sweater and jeans or something dressier, they deliver the same flexible shock-absorbing base. Arch support and a deep heel cup cradle you through every step, because feeling good at sunset dance parties never goes out of style.Smooth durable leather uppers.Slip-on style with straps that open if you want.Soft anatomically shaped cork latex core between jute layers for stability and moisture management.Suede leather lining provides a nice climate for your feet.Footbed edge is slightly raised to protect your feet from toe-stubbing.Toe bar guides your toes into place and promotes natural steps.EVA outsole for lightweight durability and absorbing shocks.Smaller sizes (up to 41) come in narrow widths for smaller volume feet.
